sen.j: 天王祭（てんのうさい）は、牛頭天王（ごずてんのう）を祀る天王社の祭である。
sen.e: Tenno-sai Festival is a festival organized by Tennosha to honor Gozu Tenno (deity said to be the Indian god Gavagriva).
Tenno-sai Festival is a festival organized by Tennosha to honor Gozu Tenno (deity said to be the Indian god Gavagriva).
Tenno-sai Festival is a festival organized by Tennosha to honor Gozu Tenno (deity said to be the Indian god Gavagriva).

sen.j: 牛頭天王は日本のスサノオと習合し、日本各所にその伝説などが点在しており、その地方で行われている事が多い。
sen.e: Syncretized with Susano no mikoto of Japan, legends of Gozu Tenno exist in various areas of Japan and Tenno-sai Festival is celebrated in many of those locations.
Syncretized with Susano no mikoto of Japan, legends of Gozu Tenno exist in various areas of Japan and Tenno-sai Festival is celebrated in many of those locations.
